description.zh-cn: 香港的政治派系，属于非建制派。支持香港全面推行普遍选举，并对中国人权状况常有所批判。
description.en: A political alignment in Hong Kong, part of the non-pro-establishment camp. It supports the full implementation of universal suffrage in Hong Kong and is often critical of the human rights situation in China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法

description.zh-cn: 由中华人民共和国中央人民政府为香港制定的国家安全法律，旨在防范、制止和惩治分裂国家、颠覆国家政权、组织实施恐怖活动和勾结外国或者境外势力危害国家安全等犯罪行为。
description.en: A national security law for Hong Kong enacted by the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China, aimed at preventing, stopping, and punishing crimes such as secession, subversion of state power, organizing and carrying out terrorist activities, and colluding with foreign or external forces to endanger national security.

description.zh-cn: 由中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会主导的香港选举制度改革，旨在落实“爱国者治港”原则。
description.en: An electoral system reform in Hong Kong led by the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China, aimed at implementing the principle of 'patriots governing Hong Kong'.

description.zh-cn: 一项政治原则，要求香港的管治权必须掌握在爱国者手中，成为2021年香港政治制度改革的核心。
description.en: A political principle requiring that the power to govern Hong Kong must be in the hands of patriots, becoming the core of the 2021 Hong Kong electoral reform.

nodes.id: 香港民主派初选大搜捕

zh-cn: 香港民主派初选大搜捕

description.zh-cn: 香港警方国安处针对2020年香港立法会选举民主派初选参与者进行的大规模拘捕行动。
description.en: A large-scale arrest operation conducted by the National Security Department of the Hong Kong Police Force targeting participants in the 2020 pro-democracy primaries for the Legislative Council election.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在中国北京的抗议示威活动，最终以武力清场告终，对香港民主派与中共的关系产生了决定性影响。
description.en: Protest demonstrations that took place in Beijing, China in 1989, ending in a violent crackdown. It had a decisive impact on the relationship between the Hong Kong pro-democracy camp and the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 香港民主派的重要人物，香港市民支援爱国民主运动联合会（支联会）创会主席。
description.en: A key figure in the Hong Kong pro-democracy camp, founding chairman of the Hong Kong Alliance in Support of Patriotic Democratic Movements of China (The Alliance).

description.zh-cn: 香港资深大律师，民主党创党主席，被誉为“香港民主之父”。
description.en: A Hong Kong senior counsel, founding chairman of the Democratic Party, known as the 'Father of Hong Kong Democracy'.

nodes.id: 香港特别行政区基本法起草委员会

zh-cn: 香港特别行政区基本法起草委员会
en: Hong Kong Basic Law Drafting Committee

description.zh-cn: 负责起草《香港特别行政区基本法》的机构。
description.en: The body responsible for drafting the Basic Law of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 香港民主派的主要政党之一，由香港民主同盟与汇点合并而成。
description.en: One of the main political parties of the pro-democracy camp in Hong Kong, formed by the merger of the United Democrats of Hong Kong and Meeting Point.

description.zh-cn: 香港首个政党，后与汇点合并为民主党。
description.en: The first political party in Hong Kong, later merged with Meeting Point to form the Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 香港八十年代的论政团体，后与香港民主同盟合并为民主党。
description.en: A political commentary group in Hong Kong in the 1980s, which later merged with the United Democrats of Hong Kong to form the Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 曾为香港民主派第二大政党，于2023年5月27日解散。
description.en: Formerly the second-largest party in the Hong Kong pro-democracy camp, it was dissolved on May 27, 2023.

description.zh-cn: 香港激进民主派政党。
description.en: A radical pro-democracy political party in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 由社民连和公民党发起的政治运动，透过辞去五个立法会地方选区议席引发补选，作为争取2012年双普选的“变相公投”。
description.en: A political movement initiated by the League of Social Democrats and the Civic Party, which triggered by-elections by resigning from seats in five geographical constituencies of the Legislative Council, serving as a 'de facto referendum' to fight for dual universal suffrage in 2012.

nodes.id: 反对修订逃犯条例运动

zh-cn: 反对修订逃犯条例运动

description.zh-cn: 一场因《2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案》引发的大规模社会运动。
description.en: A large-scale social movement triggered by the 2019 Fugitive Offenders and Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters Legislation (Amendment) Bill.

nodes.id: 2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案

zh-cn: 2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案
en: 2019 Fugitive Offenders and Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters Legislation (Amendment) Bill

description.zh-cn: 一项由香港政府提出的法律修订草案，旨在容许将香港的犯罪嫌疑人引渡至中国大陆、澳门和台湾等地，引发了大规模的反对运动。
description.en: A legislative amendment bill proposed by the Hong Kong government to allow the extradition of criminal suspects from Hong Kong to mainland China, Macau, and Taiwan, which triggered a massive opposition movement.

description.zh-cn: 香港第五任行政长官，任内推动《逃犯条例》修订引发大规模抗议。
description.en: The fifth Chief Executive of Hong Kong, whose push for the extradition bill amendment sparked large-scale protests.

description.zh-cn: 在四名民主派议员被取消资格后，其余民主派立法会议员宣布集体辞职以示抗议的事件。
description.en: An event where the remaining pro-democracy Legislative Council members announced their collective resignation in protest after four of their colleagues were disqualified.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会关于香港特别行政区立法会议员资格问题的决定

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会关于香港特别行政区立法会议员资格问题的决定
en: NPCSC decision on Hong Kong LegCo members' qualification

description.zh-cn: 由全国人大常委会通过的决定，规定了香港立法会议员丧失资格的情形，直接导致四名民主派议员被取消资格。
description.en: A decision passed by the NPCSC that stipulated the circumstances under which Hong Kong Legislative Council members would be disqualified, directly leading to the disqualification of four pro-democracy legislators.

description.zh-cn: 香港会计师，前立法会议员（会计界），2020年被取消议员资格。
description.en: A Hong Kong accountant and former Legislative Council member (Accountancy), disqualified in 2020.

description.zh-cn: 香港大律师，公民党前党魁，前立法会议员，2020年被取消议员资格。
description.en: A Hong Kong barrister, former leader of the Civic Party, and former Legislative Council member, disqualified in 2020.

description.zh-cn: 香港大律师，公民党创党成员，前立法会议员（法律界），2020年被取消议员资格。
description.en: A Hong Kong barrister, founding member of the Civic Party, and former Legislative Council member (Legal), disqualified in 2020.

description.zh-cn: 香港医生，公民党成员，前立法会议员，2020年被取消议员资格。
description.en: A Hong Kong doctor, member of the Civic Party, and former Legislative Council member, disqualified in 2020.

description.zh-cn: 香港保安局局长，前警务处处长。
description.en: Secretary for Security of Hong Kong, former Commissioner of Police.

description.zh-cn: 香港资深大律师，公民党创党成员及末任主席。
description.en: A Hong Kong senior counsel, founding member and the last chairman of the Civic Party.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法

description.zh-cn: 《港区国安法》的引入导致民主派政党的政治参与空间严重受限，并引发大规模的“解散潮”和“退党潮”。
description.en: The introduction of the National Security Law severely restricted the political participation space for pro-democracy parties and triggered a large-scale wave of dissolutions and party withdrawals.

description.zh-cn: “完善选举制度改革”后，民主派政党的政治参与空间受到严重限制。
description.en: After the 'perfection of the electoral system reform,' the political participation space for pro-democracy parties was severely restricted.

description.zh-cn: 在要求“爱国者治港”的原则下，民主派在香港政坛难以立足。
description.en: Under the principle of 'patriots governing Hong Kong,' it has become difficult for the pro-democracy camp to gain a foothold in Hong Kong politics.

relationships.source: 香港民主派初选大搜捕

description.zh-cn: 针对民主派初选参与者的大搜捕严重打击了民主派的政治活动。
description.en: The mass arrests targeting participants in the pro-democracy primaries severely cracked down on the political activities of the pro-democracy camp.

description.zh-cn: 民主派对中国人权状况常有所批判，并以“结束一党专政”和“平反六四”作为其核心诉求之一。六四事件后，民主派与中共关系决裂。
description.en: The pro-democracy camp is often critical of the human rights situation in China and holds 'ending one-party rule' and 'vindicating the June 4th incident' as its core demands. After the June 4th incident, the relationship between the pro-democracy camp and the CCP broke down.

relationships.target: 香港特别行政区基本法起草委员会

description.zh-cn: 因六四事件退出基本法起草委员会。
description.en: Withdrew from the Basic Law Drafting Committee due to the June 4th incident.

relationships.target: 香港特别行政区基本法起草委员会

description.zh-cn: 因六四事件退出基本法起草委员会。
description.en: Withdrew from the Basic Law Drafting Committee due to the June 4th incident.

description.zh-cn: 1994年，港同盟与汇点合并，形成民主党。
description.en: In 1994, the United Democrats of Hong Kong merged with Meeting Point to form the Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 1994年，汇点与港同盟合并，形成民主党。
description.en: In 1994, Meeting Point merged with the United Democrats of Hong Kong to form the Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 民主党强烈反对并以党内投票否决了参与“五区总辞”运动。
description.en: The Democratic Party strongly opposed and voted internally to reject participation in the 'Five Constituencies Referendum' movement.

description.zh-cn: 公民党表态支持“五区总辞”运动，并派出议员辞职参与。
description.en: The Civic Party expressed support for the 'Five Constituencies Referendum' movement and had its legislators resign to participate.

description.zh-cn: 社民连提出“五区总辞”构想，以作为争取2012年双普选的“变相公投”。
description.en: The League of Social Democrats proposed the idea of the 'Five Constituencies Referendum' as a 'de facto referendum' to fight for dual universal suffrage in 2012.

description.zh-cn: 因民主党在2012年政改方案上与中联办谈判并最终支持改良方案，社民连指摘民主党“出卖港人”、“投共”，导致泛民主派分裂。
description.en: Because the Democratic Party negotiated with the Liaison Office on the 2012 political reform package and ultimately supported a revised proposal, the League of Social Democrats accused the Democratic Party of 'selling out Hong Kong people' and 'surrendering to the Communists,' leading to a split in the pro-democracy camp.

relationships.target: 2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案

description.zh-cn: 时任行政长官林郑月娥领导的政府提出了《逃犯条例》修订草案。
description.en: The government led by then-Chief Executive Carrie Lam proposed the Fugitive Offenders Bill amendment.

relationships.target: 2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案

description.zh-cn: 民主派议员联同大多数香港市民对《逃犯条例》修订草案表示强烈反对，并爆发了反送中运动。
description.en: Pro-democracy legislators, along with a majority of Hong Kong citizens, strongly opposed the Fugitive Offenders Bill amendment, leading to the outbreak of the Anti-Extradition Law Amendment Bill Movement.

relationships.source: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会关于香港特别行政区立法会议员资格问题的决定

description.zh-cn: 该决定直接导致四名民主派议员被取消资格，进而引发了其余民主派议员的集体总辞。
description.en: This decision directly led to the disqualification of four pro-democracy legislators, which in turn triggered the mass resignation of the remaining pro-democracy camp members.

relationships.source: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会关于香港特别行政区立法会议员资格问题的决定

description.zh-cn: 根据该决定，香港政府宣布取消梁继昌的立法会议员资格。
description.en: According to this decision, the Hong Kong government announced the disqualification of Kenneth Leung as a Legislative Council member.

relationships.source: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会关于香港特别行政区立法会议员资格问题的决定

description.zh-cn: 根据该决定，香港政府宣布取消杨岳桥的立法会议员资格。
description.en: According to this decision, the Hong Kong government announced the disqualification of Alvin Yeung as a Legislative Council member.

relationships.source: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会关于香港特别行政区立法会议员资格问题的决定

description.zh-cn: 根据该决定，香港政府宣布取消郭荣铿的立法会议员资格。
description.en: According to this decision, the Hong Kong government announced the disqualification of Dennis Kwok as a Legislative Council member.

relationships.source: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会关于香港特别行政区立法会议员资格问题的决定

description.zh-cn: 根据该决定，香港政府宣布取消郭家麒的立法会议员资格。
description.en: According to this decision, the Hong Kong government announced the disqualification of Kwok Ka-ki as a Legislative Council member.

description.zh-cn: 在公民党解散后，保安局局长邓炳强点名批评公民党末任主席梁家杰态度轻佻，并认为他应为2019年的社会运动向年轻人及其家长道歉。
description.en: After the dissolution of the Civic Party, Secretary for Security Chris Tang publicly criticized its last chairman, Alan Leong, for his flippant attitude and suggested he should apologize to the youth and their parents for the 2019 social movement.
